title: TV Remote (com.apple.tvremote)
description: The payload that configures the Apple TV remote.

items.title: Allowed Remotes Content Item
items.description: The array of valid devices that Apple TV can connect to.

RemoteDeviceID.title: Remote Device ID
RemoteDeviceID.description: The MAC address of a permitted iOS device that can control this Apple TV. Use the format 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx', which isn't case-sensitive.

AllowedRemotes.title: Allowed Remotes
AllowedRemotes.description: The array of valid devices that Apple TV can connect to.

items.title: Allowed TVs Content Item
items.description: The array of valid Apple TV identifiers that the remote can connect to.

TVDeviceID.title: TV Device ID
TVDeviceID.description: The MAC address of an Apple TV device that the system permits this iOS device to control. Use the format 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx', which isn't case-sensitive.

TVDeviceName.title: TV Device Name
TVDeviceName.description: The name of an Apple TV device that the system permits this iOS device to control.

AllowedTVs.title: Allowed TVs
AllowedTVs.description: The array of valid Apple TV identifiers that the remote can connect to.
